name: specialist.toml

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Care specialists providing elderly care services

rawContent:
# Specialist Role
# Care workers providing services

[role]
id = "specialist"
name = "Specialist"
description = "Care specialists providing elderly care services"
level = 2

[role.identification]
method = "phone"
required = true
verification = "sms-otp"

[permissions]
list = [
  "order:read:assigned",
  "shift:start",
  "shift:end",
  "availability:manage:own"
]

[role.actions]
canDo = [
  "View assigned orders",
  "Start and end work shifts",
  "Set weekly availability",
  "View own shift history"
]
cannotDo = [
  "Create orders",
  "Assign orders to self",
  "View other specialists",
  "Access admin features"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "specialist-only"]
routes = ["specialist-home", "specialist-orders", "active-shift", "availability-setup"]
platforms = ["specialist-app"]
